name: Platformer with 3 autotile sets
description:
Simple 8x8 platformer with 3 different autotile sets: Grass, brick, cave.

Possibilities for building are endless, and when you add all other accesories like levers, buttons, boxes, coins.... Detailed account of all the accesories is down below.

Tiles:

Autotile sets - grass, brick, cave

Interactable objects - chest, doors, levers, buttons, push pads, pushbox(small and big), ladder...

Collectible items - gold coins(animated), keys

Decorative tiles - grass, vines, chains, small rocks, fence...

Platforms - tree different kinds of platforms

Parallax background - all layers sorted in folder

Enemies - slime, worm, bee (each with walk and death animations)

Obstacles - spikes(small, big), spiked boxes(small, big)
